Plot: A high school teacher's personal life becomes complicated as he works with students during the school elections, particularly with an obsessive overachiever determined to become student body president.
Writer: Tom Perrotta (novel), Alexander Payne (screenplay), Jim Taylor (screenplay)
Title: Election
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 16 wins & 33 nominations.
Actors: Matthew Broderick, Reese Witherspoon, Chris Klein, Jessica Campbell
